room_title: Escape room "Shanghai Savannah" by Encryption Escape in Savannah
room_description:
It’s 1762, and rumor has it that the local tavern has a secret tunnel that leads down to the docks. While enjoying a late-night grog, you witness the notorious Pirate Queen shanghai a drunken lad. You concoct a plan to blend in with her pox-ridden crew in order to save him.
As the S.S. Pembroke sets sail, with you and the kidnapped fellow rounding out the crew, you notice the swab on watch has fallen asleep. You now have one hour to plan an escape before the snoring sailor’s replacement arrives to relieve him, but plan your escape wisely as the Pirate Queen lives by the code that Dead Men Tell No Tales! Be careful or you’ll find yourself in a watery grave!
